note.p: Education: BA (1870, London). St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1874). Studied medicine at St Bartholomew's Hospital (1877). MB (Cambridge); DSc (London); MD (1882, Cambridge)

Career: Fellow, St John's College, Cambridge; Byers Professor of Zoology, Owen's College, Manchester (1879); alpinist and gymnast; killed when a rock gave way beneath him when photographing rocks on Scafell
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1894-1895 vol 57 pp iii-v signed by A S
